sqlMap.select: SELECT package_type.sn AS typeSn, package_product.sn AS packageProductSn, package_type.name AS typeName, product.name AS productName, package_product.product_num as productNum FROM pano_project_house_package package INNER JOIN pano_project_package_type package_type ON package.sn = package_type.house_package_sn INNER JOIN pano_project_package_product package_product ON package_type.sn = package_product.package_type_sn INNER JOIN pano_product product ON product.sn = package_product.product_sn WHERE package.sn = #packageSn# ORDER BY package_type.sn,package_product.sn
